summary: In 1975, 10-year-old Amar lives in a village in northern Morocco with his violent uncle, waiting for the unlikely return of his mother, who has left for Belgium. He finds a friend in Carmen... See full summary »
cast: Benjalil Amanallah|Paulina Gálvez|Ufrin Mustapha Azzarouali|Juan Estelrich Jr.|Abdelah Anass|Farouk Aznabet|Luis Fernández de Eribe|Noumidia Lahmidi|Said Marsi|Yousra Tarik|Mimoun Zanoun
title: Adios Carmen
